content.raw:
I started making it a plugin and didn't like all the boilerplate required to do so. So I started working on base classes for plugins so that plugins don't need to implement all the methods they are not using, but that is [not quite ready yet](https://i.imgur.com/rQIb4Vw.gifv).

So I will merge this and make it a plugin once base classes for plugins with stub methods for everything exist. Worth it I think to keep the code modular, but it's easy to not ruin the surprise by just having it default to on if not present in labconfig.

I started making it a plugin and didn't like all the boilerplate required to do so. So I started working on base classes for plugins so that plugins don't need to implement all the methods they are not using, but that is not quite ready yet.

So I will merge this and make it a plugin once base classes for plugins with stub methods for everything exist. Worth it I think to keep the code modular, but it's easy to not ruin the surprise by just having it default to on if not present in labconfig.
